data.title: Office of the State Auditor
data.meta_description: The Mission of the Office of the State Auditor is to provide Utah taxpayers and government officials with an independent assessment of financial operation, statutory compliance, and performance management for state and local government.
data.text:
Teacher Pay

The Teacher Pay dashboard displays trends in teacher wages and benefits in Utah. The LEA view shows teacher pay trends statewide and by LEA. The School view shows trends in teacher pay for schools within a selected LEA. In both views, users can filter by school year, pay type, FTE status, and school level. Summary information is broken down by teachersâ€™ degree level and years of experience.
